user_instruction: 'Compose an email to get ConstructCo Solutions started on the new project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Kick-Off Coordination & Requested Materials for [Project Name]

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. My name is [Your Name], and I’ll be the primary point of contact for ConstructCo Solutions on your project. We’re excited to get started and want to make sure we’re fully aligned with your team’s objectives, timeline, and processes from day one.

To help us ramp up quickly, could you please share or confirm access to the following?

1. Project overview and scope documents (latest revisions)
2. Design drawings / technical specifications
3. Key milestones, schedule, and any “no-later-than” dates
4. Site logistics plan (lay-down areas, delivery windows, safety requirements, etc.)
5. Permits or compliance documentation we should review
6. Current subcontractor coordination matrix or contact list
7. Access to the relevant Notion workspace (or links to pages you’d like us to reference)
8. Any recent email threads or folders in Gmail that outline decisions or action items

If there are other resources—calendars, stakeholder lists, or reporting templates—you’d like us to follow, just let us know and we’ll integrate those into our workflow.

Could we also schedule a brief 30-minute kickoff call early next week to run through deliverables and clarify any immediate questions? I’ve included a few time slots below; feel free to pick whichever works best or propose alternatives, and I’ll send a calendar invite:

• Tue [date] @ 10:00 AM  
• Wed [date] @ 1:30 PM  
• Thu [date] @ 3:00 PM  

Thank you in advance, Jane. We appreciate your guidance and look forward to collaborating closely with you and the team.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Project Coordinator | ConstructCo Solutions  
[phone] • [email]

final_output:
